attributes.action: Reject the petition against The Queen's invitation to President Trump.
attributes.additional_details:
Donald J Trump - President of the United States of America said "if you vote for me I will put a temporary ban on migration" 
The people voted. Mr Trump won, by a long way, and has done exactly as he promised and what people voted for him to do. Respect the will of the people. Respect the leader of the free world.
attributes.background:
We the British public call on the Government to reject the treacherous petition against Her Majesty the Queens invitation for a State Visit of President Trump. 
We stand shoulder to shoulder with The President. Ideally we would like the UK government would follow suit
